name: Guerilla Marketing
description:
How to Play:

You work for a company, AzzuTek based in Venice, Italy. Your company stock value has been plummeting for weeks and you resort to sneaking into a rich people parties and defacing all their art with advertisments
If the partiers see you without a mask they will surely kick you out. Deface as much art as you can without getting caught

Controls:

-Left click to toggle party mask
-[F] to replace art
-[W,A,S,D] to move
